verbose_text: Our study further reveals that antigen- presenting cells (APCs), such as dendritic cells (DCs), can sense double stranded DNA (dsDNA) fragments and/or cGAMP derived from Brca1 deficient cells upon PARP inhibition and drive a STING dependent type I IFN signal that mediates, in part, the therapeutic efficacy of PARP inhibition in Brca1 deficient tumors.
evidence: IFN signal that mediates, in part, the therapeutic efficacy of PARP
